turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Hi there! How can I help?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I can hear myself in the background. Did you remember to put on headphones or earbuds?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What can I do for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: What can I do for you? Can yo order me a pizza from Bella Luna?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure I can! what would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want a three pizza large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: and what type of pizzas would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One One meat lover pizza, and one pepperoni pizza, and the other one is just cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: So i got, 3 large pizzas, One meatlover, and one pepperoni and another cheese only.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes. I want all of three with thick crust.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thick crust, got it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: 3 large pizzas with thick crust, One meatlover, one pepperoni and one cheese only.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, correct.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great! one moment while i grab the total for you.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great, one moment while I grab the total for you. Okay.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total for these three pizzas will be $34.23.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay. that's good.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Alright, one moment while I send your order to Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay, thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Done! your pizzas are in the works and should be ready for pickup in 40 min.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right, thank you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: you're welcome!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: bye bye!
